column1: This movie was incredibly moving. The lead actor gave a phenomenal performance!
I found the plot quite boring. The pacing was slow and there was no real climax.
A masterpiece! Stunning visuals, excellent soundtrack, and a gripping story from start to finish.
The film was okay, but the ending felt rushed and underwhelming.
An emotional rollercoaster. I laughed, cried, and felt every moment deeply.
